## Lesson 5: Model Diagnostics

---

<a href = "https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/index.html"><img src='https://certara.github.io/R-model-results/articles/img/ModelResults.png'  align="left" style = "height: 150px; padding-right: 10px;"/></a>

In Lesson 5, we will continue to introduce the modeling capabilities with the [`RsNLME`](https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/index.html) package and demonstrate how to easily generate `ggplot2` based model diagnostics plots using the [Model Results Shiny GUI](https://certara.github.io/R-model-results/index.html). We will then demonstrate how to generate the underlying `xpose` and `ggplot2` code from the Shiny GUI, saving as an R script for reproducibility.


<br></br>
<br></br>
<br></br>


### Live Webinar Date: 8/23/2022 @10am EST

In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

* Creating a data object (`xpose_data`) in R from RsNLME model output
* Using the Shiny GUI to easily explore model diagnostic plots and tables
* Reproducing and extending model diagnostics from the command line
* Export plots and tables to different file output
